title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Strategies for Developing Elementary Math Educational Materials and Personalized Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently develop and modify elementary mathematics digital resources aligned with curriculum standards

Learners analyze three image classification model educational materials suitable for 5th–6th graders, propose ≥3 adaptation methods (e.g., offline activities, simplified code, alternative tools) considering classroom environments (device availability, internet speed), and submit a report meeting ≥4/5 peer evaluation rubric items.

Teachers use design resources from AI-based educational platforms (e.g., ChatGPT, Google Teachable Machine) to develop ≥3 differentiated instructional strategies (individualized learning, project-based learning, gamification), implement them in ≥2 classes, and achieve ≥80% student engagement satisfaction in surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
